page.title: 07A visit to the church 2
page.content: It was a small room with two arched windows. You could see down on to the altar from the windows. We went on and we looked through a sort of triangle window. It was the bell room. There was not much room in the bell part so we could not go in, just look through the window. When we got to the top me and Julie were a bit dizzy so we were glad that we were at the top. From the top I saw the swimming baths and our school and the school house. You could see the street and the grave yard. When we went back down Reverend Douglas took the other group up.
